<title level="1" right="Rules">[Item Level](/Rules.aspx?ID=2925)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A new item is typically going to be within a few levels of the PCs. If it’s too low, it might not be interesting, and if it’s too high, it might be too powerful or too lucrative to sell.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
